description.esp: Jorj Car'das era un humano de Corellia que vivió durante la época de la República Galáctica, el Imperio Galáctico y la Nueva República. Al principio de su vida, Car'das se unió a la tripulación de la nave contrabandista Bargain Hunter, trabajando principalmente como traficante para los hutts.
description.eng: Jorj Car'das was a Human from Corellia who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic, the Galactic Empire, and the New Republic. Early in his life, Car'das joined the crew of the smuggler ship Bargain Hunter, working primarily as a smuggler for the Hutts.

description.esp: Lando Calrissian era un humano que en diferentes momentos de su vida fue un apostador profesional, empresario, contrabandista y general. Natal de Socorro, se convirtió en apostador y estafador en sus primeros años de vida, eventualmente ganando su propia nave, el Halcón Milenario, en un juego de sabacc a un hombre llamado Cix Trouvee.
description.eng: Lando Calrissian was a human who at different points in his life was a professional gambler, businessman, bootlegger, and general. A native of Socorro, he became a gambler and con man in his early life, eventually winning his own ship, the Millennium Falcon, in a game of sabacc from a man named Cix Trouvee.

description.esp: Vilmarh Grahrk o también conocido como Villie, fue un contrabandista devaroniano durante los últimos días de la República Galáctica y los primeros días del Imperio Galáctico. Villie se caracterizó por realizar actos deshonestos y secretos en su búsqueda de dinero y mujeres.
description.eng: Vilmarh Grahrk or also known as Villie, was a Devaronian smuggler during the last days of the Galactic Republic and the early days of the Galactic Empire. Villie was noted for engaging in dishonest and secret acts in his pursuit of money and women.

description.esp: El Bargain Hunter era un carguero ligero propiedad de Dubrak Qennto y tripulado por Maris Ferasi y Jorj Car'das. Pudo funcionar entre 600 y 650 horas en subluz antes de necesitar repostar, y estaba equipado con láseres y misiles.
description.eng: The Bargain Hunter was a light freighter owned by Dubrak Qennto and crewed by Maris Ferasi and Jorj Car'das. It was able to go for between 600 and 650 hours at sublight before needing to refuel, and it was equipped with lasers and missiles.

The Millennium Falcon was a Corellian YT-1300 light freighter used by smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca during the Galactic Civil War. Its aged appearance belied numerous advanced modifications to increase the ship's speed, weapons, and shielding allowing it to outperform Imperial Star Destroyers.
description.esp: El Halcón Milenario era un carguero ligero corelliano YT-1300 utilizado por los contrabandistas Han Solo y Chewbacca durante la Guerra Civil Galáctica. Su apariencia envejecida ocultaba numerosas modificaciones avanzadas para aumentar la velocidad, las armas y el escudo de la nave, lo que le permitía superar a los Destructores Estelares Imperiales.

description.eng: The Inferno was a light freighter piloted by the smuggler Vilmarh Grahrk. It was a solid and sturdy looking starship and was of much use to her owner during the last days of the Galactic Republic and the early days of the Galactic Empire.
description.esp: El Inferno era un carguero ligero piloteado por el contrabandista Vilmarh Grahrk. Era un nave estelar de apariencia sólida y robusta y fue de mucha utilidad para su propietario durante los últimos días de la República Galáctica y los primeros días del Imperio Galáctico.

Corellia era un planeta ubicado en los Mundos del Núcleo de la galaxia conocido por sus pilotos as y sus grandes naves estelares. En Corellia se construyeron naves como el Halcón Milenario y las naves estelares imperiales.
description.eng: Corellia was a planet located in the galaxy's Core Worlds known for its ace pilots and large starships. Vessels such as the Millennium Falcon and Imperial starships were built on Corellia.

description.esp: Soccorro era un planeta en los Territorios del Borde Exterior con reputación de refugio de contrabandistas. Era el mundo natal de Lando Calrissian. El planeta Socorro poseía una atmósfera respirable, gravedad estándar, un clima árido y un terreno que incluía oleaje negro del desierto, llanuras, áreas montañosas y áreas volcánicas.
description.eng: Soccorro was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories with a reputation as a smuggler haven. It was the homeworld of Lando Calrissian. The planet Socorro possessed a breathable atmosphere, standard gravity, an arid climate, and terrain that included black desert swells, flatlands, mountain areas, and volcanic areas.

description.esp: Devaron era un planeta terrestre ubicado en el sistema Devaron de las colonias de la galaxia que era el planeta natal de la especie devaroniano. Se caracterizaban por ser un planeta templado y muy boscoso con numerosos ríos y valles.
description.eng: Devaron was a terrestrial planet located in the Devaron system of the galaxy colonies that was the home planet of the Devaronian species. They were characterized by being a temperate and heavily forested planet with numerous rivers and valleys.
